byline.original: By JON CARAMANICA, NATE CHINEN and BEN RATLIFF

abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews new album by indie rock band Real Estate; Nate Chinen reviews latest recording by folk indie group My Brightest Diamond; Ben Ratliff reviews newest release by jazz pianist Harold O'Neal.
snippet: Reviews of “Days” by Real Estate; “All Things Will Unwind” by My Brightest Diamond; and “Marvelous Fantasy” by Harold O’Neal.
lead_paragraph: Reviews of “Days” by Real Estate; “All Things Will Unwind” by My Brightest Diamond; and “Marvelous Fantasy” by Harold O’Neal.

headline.main: New Music From Real Estate, My Brightest Diamond, Harold O’Neal
headline.seo: New Music From Real Estate, My Brightest Diamond, Harold O’Neal
